snippet.title: MWT: Tank Battles — Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Artstorm Studios and Gaijin Entertainment are pleased to announce a new online military shooter: MWT: Tank Battles. The game is dedicated to modern and planned models of ground and air combat vehicles which take part in grandiose joint battles. MWT: Tank Battles will be released on iOS and Android platforms in 2024 after several stages of testing.

• Site: https://artstorm.com/en-US/tank-battles
• Discord: https://discord.gg/mwt-tankbattles
• Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/mwttankbattles
• Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/mwt_tank_battles/
• X: https://twitter.com/MWTankBattles
• Telegram: https://t.me/MWTTankBattles
